text:
Credit: Instagram

Kris Jenner Looks Like a “Snack” in Hot New Bikini Photo Posted By Khloe Kardashian

by 0 Shares

Advertisement

Kris Jenner is a hot mama! The matriarch of the Kardashian clan may have to compete with her daughters after this. Daughter Khloe posted a photo of her mother in a bikini on her Instagram on July 29.

In the photo, the 61-year-old is taking a mirror selfie while wearing a white bikini and knit kimono. "Kris Jenner looking like a snack! I see you mommy! #6KidsAndBad," Khloe captioned the photo.

Kris Jenner looking like a snack! I see you mommy! #6KidsAndBad! A post shared by Khlo (@khloekardashian) on Jul 29, 2017 at 9:05am PDT

The momager doesn't show off her body as much as her famous daughters, but she has posted photos in the past of her bikini looks. In 2013, she posted a photo of herself in a blue bikini in a pool.

Last day of summer gonna miss you. A post shared by Kris Jenner (@krisjenner) on Sep 15, 2013 at 3:46pm PDT

In 2014, she posted another poolside pic in a black bikini.

Celebrate Life. A post shared by Kris Jenner (@krisjenner) on Jan 7, 2014 at 12:28pm PST

On July 17, 2017, the brunette beauty posted a photo from her French Riviera vacation. In the photo, she wears a black bikini and lacy coverup.

#mood #eze #anjuna #flamingos A post shared by Kris Jenner (@krisjenner) on Jul 17, 2017 at 3:36am PDT

Kris is currently living her best life on vacation with boyfriend Corey Gamble. She's been posting Instagram shots from her European trip during the entire month of July.

So proud of this company @marykayus best sunscreen ever!! Also the After Sun Gel... #amazing #MaryKay #vacationvibes #thisisnotanad @emiliopucci A post shared by Kris Jenner (@krisjenner) on Jul 14, 2017 at 5:52am PDT

Since she's been away, fans have not only speculated that her beau popped the question, but that she has also received butt implants based on her new curvy look. Neither rumor has been confirmed.

Happy Place #yachtlife #blessed A post shared by Kris Jenner (@krisjenner) on Jul 11, 2017 at 5:16pm PDT

We're with Khloe on this one.
title: Kris Jenner Looks Like a “Snack” in Hot New Bikini Photo Posted By Khloe Kardashian

meta_data.description: Khloe Kardashian posted a photo on her Instagram page of Kris Jenner wearing a bikini and called her a "snack."
